item.title: Prozone Realty Ltd Falls 11.62%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Decline
item.description: Prozone Realty Ltd’s stock declined sharply over the week ending 20 February 2026, falling 11.62% from ₹57.38 to ₹50.71, while the Sensex gained 0.39%. The week was marked by a downgrade in the company’s Mojo Grade from Buy to Hold, mixed technical signals, and a recalibration of valuation metrics, all contributing to investor caution amid broader market volatility. Time: 8 minutes ago

item.title: The Byke Hospitality Ltd Falls 4.75%: Downgrade and 52-Week Low Mark a Challenging Week
item.description: The Byke Hospitality Ltd experienced a difficult week from 16 to 20 February 2026, with its share price declining 4.75% to close at Rs.48.29, significantly underperforming the Sensex which gained 0.39% over the same period. The stock faced a downgrade to a Strong Sell rating amid mixed financial signals and deteriorating technical indicators, culminating in a fresh 52-week low of Rs.45 on 18 February. item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Dec-2025 Results Reveal Mixed Trends Across Market Caps
item.description: The December 2025 quarter earnings season has concluded with 4,095 companies reporting results, revealing a nuanced landscape of corporate performance marked by modest profit growth and varied sectoral outcomes.
